Text: too bad only subtitles are multilang

RE: my last post..

fixed by copying the 2 .bin files to a temp dir and renaming them from setup-1 to install-1 etc.

installing now
argh.. fixed the install problem, now screen is all garbled. ideas anyone?

@JustFrog
suggest you uninstall the whole thing and use proper installation method ie. mount the image file (.bin file in this case) using daemon tools or alcohol 120% and run the installer inside the virtual drive u just mounted.

@revanhan: Did just that.. but the install calls for the wrong file install instead of setup, etc install runs fine, game ,oads runs fine, but when I actually enter the game the map screen where everything is done is all garbled. it's not a DX issue nor a driver issue.. just wondered if anyone had a fix or a workaround
